author: Victoria Klesty
title: Norway extends coronavirus restrictions until April 13
description: Norway extended on Tuesday the restrictions it put in place on a range of public and private institutions, including schools and nurseries due to the coronavirus pandemic, until April 13.
content:
OSLO (Reuters) - Norway on Tuesday extended restrictions on a range of public and private institutions due to the coronavirus pandemic until April 13, including the closure of schools and nurseries.
